select a.ID as BizID,SaleUserID as Receiver,a.ProjectID from B_CustomerFollowUp b inner join B_Opportunity a on a.id=b.OpportunityID and a.IsDel=0 and a.Status=1 AND a.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} left join S_Message c on a.id=c.BIZID and a.SaleUserID=c.Receiver and c.isdel=0 and c.status=1 and c.MessageType='487F2C39-779D-097B-455B-799AC0B3CBB4' INNER JOIN dbo.B_RemindRule d ON d.ProjectID=a.ProjectID AND d.Status=1 AND d.IsDel=0 and d.WaitForVisit=1 AND d.VersionEndTime IS NULL where b.IsDel=0 and b.Status=1 and convert(date,b.NextFollowUpDate)=convert(date,getdate()) and c.id is NULL AND EXISTS(SELECT id FROM dbo.B_SalesGroupMember WHERE ProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND IsDel=0 AND Status=1 AND MemberID=a.SaleUserID AND RoleID IN('0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7'))

select a.ID as BizID,a.SaleUserID as Receiver,f.JhqyDate as Ext2 from B_Opportunity a LEFT JOIN dbo.S_Message b ON b.BizID=a.ID AND b.Receiver=a.SaleUserID AND b.IsDel=0 AND b.Status=1 AND b.MessageType=#{MessageType} inner join B_CustomerAttach e on a.id=e.OpportunityID and e.isdel=0 and e.SalesStatus=4 inner join s_Trade g on e.id=g.oppguid inner join s_order f on g.[TradeGUID]=f.[TradeGUID] where a.IsDel=0 and a.Status=4 and a.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND b.id IS NULL and datediff(day,GETDATE(),f.JhqyDate)=ISNULL(#{Time},0) AND EXISTS(SELECT id FROM dbo.B_SalesGroupMember WHERE ProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND IsDel=0 AND Status=1 AND MemberID=a.SaleUserID AND RoleID IN('0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7'))

SELECT a.OpportunityID as BizID,c.SaleUserID as Receiver,e.lastDate as Ext2 FROM dbo.B_CustomerAttach a INNER JOIN dbo.C_MYTrade b ON a.ID=b.OppGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity c ON c.ID=a.OpportunityID AND c.IsDel=0 AND c.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} LEFT JOIN S_Message d ON d.BizID=c.ID AND d.IsDel=0 AND d.Status=1 AND d.Receiver=c.SaleUserID AND d.MessageType=#{MessageType} INNER JOIN( select FeeGUID,a.TradeGUID,a.lastDate as lastDate from s_Fee a inner join s_Trade b on a.TradeGUID=b.TradeGUID where Ye<>0 and CONVERT(DATE,DATEADD(d,ISNULL(-#{Time},0),a.lastDate))=convert(date,getdate()) ) e ON e.TradeGUID=b.TradeGUID WHERE a.IsDel=0 AND a.Status=1 AND a.SalesStatus=4 AND a.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} and d.ID is null AND EXISTS(SELECT id FROM dbo.B_SalesGroupMember WHERE ProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND IsDel=0 AND Status=1 AND MemberID=c.SaleUserID AND RoleID IN('0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7'))

SELECT c.ID BizID, 'Clue' BizType, ca.ProjectID, c.ReportUserID Receiver, o.CustomerName, o.CustomerMobile FROM dbo.C_MYBooking myb INNER JOIN dbo.B_CustomerAttach ca ON ca.ID=myb.OppGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity o ON o.ID=ca.OpportunityID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue c ON c.ID=o.ClueID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ClueRule cr ON c.RuleID=cr.ID AND cr.ProtectSource =#{Source} WHERE ( myb.Status<>'关闭' or (myb.Status='关闭' AND myb.CloseYy='转认购')) AND o.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND DATEDIFF(DAY,myb.CreateTime,GETDATE())=0 AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT BizID,ProjectID,Receiver ReportUserID FROM dbo.S_Message m WHERE Subject='客户认筹提醒' AND m.MessageType='FE54E9CB-C0EC-45A9-B139-A47BAC9DA7CF' AND m.ProjectID=o.ProjectID AND m.Receiver=c.ReportUserID AND m.BizID=c.ID )

SELECT c.ID BizID, 'Clue' BizType, ca.ProjectID, c.ReportUserID Receiver, o.CustomerName, o.CustomerMobile FROM dbo.C_MYOrder myo LEFT JOIN dbo.C_MYTrade myt ON myo.TradeGUID= myt.TradeGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_CustomerAttach ca ON ca.ID= myt.OppGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity o ON o.ID= ca.OpportunityID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue c ON c.ID= o.ClueID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ClueRule cr ON c.RuleID= cr.ID AND cr.ProtectSource =#{Source} WHERE ( myo.Status<> '关闭' OR ( myo.Status= '关闭' AND myo.CloseReason= '转签约' )) AND o.ProjectID= #{ProjectID} AND DATEDIFF( DAY, myo.QSDate, GETDATE()) = 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT BizID, ProjectID, Receiver ReportUserID FROM dbo.S_Message m WHERE Subject = '客户认购提醒' AND m.MessageType= '814E3403-C0F3-43DC-9763-7C175595DA0F' AND m.ProjectID= o.ProjectID AND m.Receiver= c.ReportUserID AND m.BizID= c.ID )

SELECT t.BizID, t.BizType, t.ProjectID, t.ZqDate, t.ReportUserID Receiver, t.CustomerName, t.CustomerMobile FROM (SELECT c.ID BizID, 'Clue' BizType, ca.ProjectID, CASE
WHEN myc.ChgDate >= myc.ZqDate THEN myc.ChgDate ELSE myc.ZqDate END ZqDate, c.ReportUserID, myc.Status, o.CustomerName, o.CustomerMobile FROM dbo.C_MYContract myc LEFT JOIN dbo.C_MYTrade myt ON myc.TradeGUID= myt.TradeGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_CustomerAttach ca ON ca.ID= myt.OppGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity o ON o.ID= ca.OpportunityID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue c ON c.ID= o.ClueID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ClueRule cr ON c.RuleID= cr.ID AND cr.ProtectSource =#{Source} ) t WHERE t.Status<> '关闭' AND t.ProjectID= #{ProjectID} AND DATEDIFF( DAY, t.ZqDate, GETDATE()) = 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT BizID, ProjectID, Receiver ReportUserID FROM dbo.S_Message m WHERE Subject = '客户签约提醒' AND m.MessageType= '0F45C158-A9B0-40A9-B9DD-6333A4E99245' AND m.ProjectID= t.ProjectID AND m.Receiver= t.ReportUserID AND m.BizID= t.BizID )

SELECT c.ID BizID, 'Clue' BizType, ca.ProjectID, c.ReportUserID Receiver, o.CustomerName, o.CustomerMobile FROM dbo.C_MYContract myc INNER JOIN dbo.C_MYTrade myt ON myc.TradeGUID= myt.TradeGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_CustomerAttach ca ON ca.ID= myt.OppGUID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity o ON o.ID= ca.OpportunityID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue c ON c.ID= o.ClueID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ClueRule cr ON c.RuleID= cr.ID AND cr.ProtectSource =#{Source} WHERE myc.Status= '关闭' AND myc.CloseReason= '退房' AND DATEDIFF( DAY, myc.CloseDate, GETDATE()) = 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT BizID, ProjectID, Receiver ReportUserID FROM dbo.S_Message m WHERE Subject = '客户退房提醒' AND m.MessageType= 'EB7423A9-3C97-4E87-BDF2-2C1DDCC55FE2' AND m.ProjectID= o.ProjectID AND m.Receiver= c.ReportUserID AND m.BizID= c.ID )

SELECT c.id BizID, 'Clue' BizType, c.IntentProjectID ProjectID, c.ReportUserID Receiver, c.Name CustomerName, c.Mobile CustomerMobile FROM dbo.B_Clue c LEFT JOIN dbo.B_CustomerPotential cp ON c.CustomerPotentialID= cp.ID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ClueRule cr ON c.RuleID= cr.ID AND cr.ProtectSource=#{Source} WHERE c.Status= 3 AND c.IntentProjectID= #{ProjectID} AND DATEDIFF( DAY, c.InvalidTime, GETDATE()) = 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT BizID, ProjectID, Receiver ReportUserID FROM dbo.S_Message m WHERE Subject = '客户无效提醒' AND m.MessageType= '3698A744-03D6-4715-A642-70455A1C7E9A' AND m.ProjectID= c.IntentProjectID AND m.Receiver= c.ReportUserID AND m.BizID= c.ID )
